attributes.action: Withdraw any UK involvement with the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is no longer a song contest, but has become very political, and we have no chance of ever winning. Why would you want to enter a competition when you know that you can never win!! Also the UK is one of a few countries which contributes a lot of money for this competition to exist. I assume this is taxpayers money and I strongly object to my money being used in this way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
